metadata.name: Harvesting Of Wifi Credentials Via Netsh.EXE
metadata.comment: Detect the harvesting of wifi credentials using netsh.exe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\netsh.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('netsh.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('wlan')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' s')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' p')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' k')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('=clear')))

output.summary: Detect the harvesting of wifi credentials using netsh.exe
